Contributor: Hutaf, Ahgiet, artist.; National Printing & Engraving Company (U.S.);
Note: Signed "Ahgiet Hutaf." Date based on America's participation in the war. "010824" appears on the bottom right of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to join the United States Tank Corps open to fighting men 18 to 45. Illustration shows a huge blue cat with sharp claws, flying and crushing tanks on the ground.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
Subject: World War, 1914-1918 -- Propaganda.; War posters, American.; United States -- Armed forces -- Recruiting, enlistment, etc.;

Title: Treat 'em rough
